alert.note: Alert for Graham; Northern Jackson; Swain (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 3:15AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, Swain and Graham Counties through 345 AM EDT... At 315 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Waynesville to 7 miles north of Robbinsville. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sylva, Bryson City, Robbinsville, Cherokee, Balsam, Webster, Dillsboro, Town Of Santeetlah, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap and Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
